O

Object - Class in fast3d.complex
a class to combine multiple groups
the renderable interface is implemented just to make this addable to an universe and to make it detectable by ray tracing
note: to add this to an universe does not mean to add the groups to the universe, but just to make clicking and selecting work
although the contained groups can be part of a 3d-object, they can be independent
Object(Vector3d, Group...) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Object
 
Object(Group...) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Object
the initial position will be Vector3d.zero()
Object(Vector3d, List<Group>) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Object
 
Object(List<Group>) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Object
the initial position will be Vector3d.zero()
ObjFileLoader - Class in fast3d.util.serial
loads an *.obj-file
the filename does not have to end with *.obj / *.mtl, just the files content matters
every "g"-tag will create a new fast3d.complex.Group and every "o"-tag will create a new fast3d.complex.Object
every Group will be packed to the previously declared Object, every Object will be packed to one fast3d.complex.Scene
the first undeclared group and object are called as the content of the unnamed field (should only be changed for good reason)
ObjFileLoader() - Constructor for class fast3d.util.serial.ObjFileLoader
 
objs - Variable in class fast3d.complex.Scene
direct access to the internal storage permitted
ObstructableLight - Class in fast3d.complex.light
some forms of light (e.g. directional- or point- light) may cause shadows
ObstructableLight(Universe) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.light.ObstructableLight
for illuminating it has to be calculated, whether an illuminatable lays in the shadow of another
obstructings(Illuminatable) - Method in class fast3d.complex.light.ObstructableLight
should be used by illuminate(Illuminatable) to determine whether the Illuminatable to currently illuminate lays in the shadow of another
onActivate() - Method in class fast3d.simple.controls.SFPUControl
registers the needed listeners
makes the panel3d focusable
onDeactivate() - Method in class fast3d.simple.controls.SFPUControl
unregisters the listeners
one() - Static method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
 
one() - Static method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
 
one() - Static method in class fast3d.math.Vector4d
 
onGround - Variable in class fast3d.simple.shapes.Cone
whether to make the cone stand on the xz-plate (true) or let is center be (0,0,0) (false)
onGround - Variable in class fast3d.simple.shapes.Cylinder
whether to make the cone stand on the xz-plate (true) or let is center be (0,0,0) (false)
openFileToPlay(File) - Static method in class fast3d.util.SimpleAudio
opens the file and reads the header
openFileToPlay(String) - Static method in class fast3d.util.SimpleAudio
a wrapper around openFileToPlay(File)
ORANGE() - Static method in class fast3d.util.ColorGen
 
oriented - Variable in class fast3d.math.CameraMode
if turned true, for all vertices behind the cameras position the shading result will be null.
overflow(double, double, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.MathUtil
if the value is within the interval [min,max[ it remains the same
otherwise if it will overflow upper and subtracted by max until it is in the interval
otherwise if it will overflow lower and added by max until it is in the interval
